channel.title: Week 0 on my new hugo site
channel.description: Recent content in Week 0 on my new hugo site

item.title: Day 0
item.description: Today is your first day of all star code! woohoo! Your adventure begins now!

item.title: Day 1
item.description: Arrays and loops are two important parts of JS, these two foundational skills could be used to your advantage in many situations to come. Make sure you understand what they are and how they work! Don’t be afraid to ask for help.

item.title: Day 2
item.description: Conditionals are yet another foundational skill that could really help you out. Not only that but you also have your site visit today as it’s Wednesday! :smiley: Have fun!

item.title: Day 3
item.description: Functions are awesome, and super useful, make sure you can use them because they are definitely one of the most important skills in Javascript. You’ll also be introduced to the Facebook of the professional world, LinkedIn. And you’ve got a guest speaker at the end of the day!

item.title: Day 4
item.description: This is the last day of your first full week at All Star Code! You’ve got a big project for today. Along with Battleroom and the return statement. Have fun!
